ygData.subject: Re: FP helmets?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... True, since we could use charred and black enamelled for a black look.  Of course, I m still using my dwarven boots and darkmail gauntlets, so if I can
ygData.messageBody:
Krukhan Garabash wrote:
>
> From: "Krukhan Garabash" <krukhan@...>
>
> yep, the gate guards drop them at least 80%...though if you aren't doing the
> killing yourself expect loot competition from scores of newbs looking for
> easy xp from a freeport quest that involves the helms...they wouldn't leave
> us alone when i went for mine.
>
> i have a near complete df suit. don't like the two-tone look at all. greaves
> should match boots as a rule. i would rather have seen a 100% blood red
> suit.
>

True, since we could use charred and black enamelled for a black
look. Of course, I'm still using my dwarven boots and darkmail
gauntlets, so if I can just get a black bracer I'll be set.

Xilith
